494300.name: Hyperspace Pinball - Soundtrack
494300.description:
You asked for it and we delivered: The Hyperspace Pinball soundtrack is now available for download!

The songs which come with this DLC, which is downloaded to your "steamapps\common\Hyperspace Pinball\Soundtrack" folder, include:
  • Main Menu
  • Game Music (L1-L3): "Morning NewYork"
  • Game Music (L6-L8): "Hi Joel"
  • Game Music: Boss levels
  • Game Music: Endurance & Bonus rounds
  • Game Music: Boss Challenges
  • Win Game
  • Lose Game

The two songs not included in the DLC at the request of the composer may be found online using your favorite search engine:
  • Game Music (L11-L13) - Dirty Clean by ACSourse
  • Game Music (L15-L19) - Crossfire by ACSourse
